draft.subject: SCCCI Invitation: Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026
draft.email_blurb: We invite your secretariat to the SCCCI Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026, offering critical insights into the upcoming economic landscape. This complimentary event for SCCCI members provides valuable strategic foresight for the year ahead. Secure your attendance now via the registration link.
draft.whatsapp_text: SCCCI invites you to the Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026 on Feb 4, 9 AM - 12:30 PM. Gain vital economic insights for the year ahead. Free for SCCCI members; $20 for non-members. Register here: https://forms.office.com/r/w4ErtY32yV

event.description_preview: Annual Business Outlook Forum 2026 February 04, 2026 - February 04, 2026 (add to calendar) 09:00 AM - 12:30 PM Non-Member Price : $ 20.00 Member Price : Free Share Click Here To Register Join this event

draft.subject: SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026: A Future-Forward Event for Your Members
draft.email_blurb: We are pleased to invite your association to the SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026, a pivotal event designed to explore the latest technological advancements. This two-day physical symposium, held on January 21-22, 2026, at the SCCCI Auditorium, offers complimentary access for SCCCI members and a nominal fee of $20 for non-members. Encourage your members to register now for this essential industry update at https://www.sccci.org.sg/user/event/registerEvent/sccci-tech-symposium-2026.
draft.whatsapp_text: SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026: Jan 21-22. Explore tech advancements. Free for SCCCI members, $20 non-members. Register now: https://www.sccci.org.sg/user/event/registerEvent/sccci-tech-symposium-2026

event.description_preview: SCCCI Tech Symposium 2026 January 21, 2026 - January 22, 2026 (add to calendar) 10:00 AM - 05:00 PM Location : SCCCI Auditorium, 47 Hill Street, Singapore 179365 Non-Member Price : $ 20.00 Member Price : Free Share * This is a physical attendance only event. * * If you encounter any issues with your registration, please reach out to Mr Chris Foo via chris@sccci.org.sg * For any other enquiries, please reach out to Mr Chris Foo via chris@sccci.org.sg . The event confirmation will be sent out 3 days prior to the event, if not earlier. in event of overwhelming response, priority will be given to SCCCI Members. ** There will not be any refund after sign-up, unless event is postponed/cancelled by organiser. Participation in Morning Session is mandatory for access to Afternoon Breakout Workshops

draft.subject: SCCCI: Free Workshop - Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth
draft.email_blurb: We invite you to SCCCI's upcoming workshop, 'Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth and Innovation'. This free session on November 21, 2025, from 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM, will equip your association with strategies to foster growth. Register now to secure your spot.
draft.whatsapp_text: SCCCI invites association secretariats to a free workshop: Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth & Innovation. Learn strategies on Nov 21, 2025, 10 AM - 12 PM. Enhance value for your members. Register now: https://forms.gle/9Lo7mw1wpqr9gjMS7

event.title: Unpacking Customer-centricity for Growth and Innovation

draft.subject: SCCCI Business Mission to China: Shanghai & Nanjing (Nov 2025)
draft.email_blurb: SCCCI invites your members to join our Business Mission Trip to Shanghai and Nanjing from November 05-08, 2025. This mission is designed to help participants explore new market opportunities and establish valuable connections in China. Secure your participation by registering via the provided link before October 15, 2025.
